Blacksmith Pushkin:
Nice to meet you, wanderer! I'm Blacksmith Pushkin.
My brother Rupio and I have been dispatched from the great Black Anvil Guild, and we are trying to turn this place into the best forge in Giran. Not everything is ready, but we will do our best to complete your requests!
